title: Mushishi Zoku Shou: Suzu no Shizuku
synopsis: On a warm summer day, a boy heard the sound of bells ringing, as if in celebration, in the mountain near his home. Several years later in that same mountain, the mushishi Ginko encounters a strange girl with weeds growing out of her body. Soon after, Ginko coincidentally runs into the now grown-up boy Yoshiro on his way off the mountain. With Yoshiroâ€™s help, Ginko soon begins to uncover who this mysterious girl is and what happened to her.
